sentence.Network_en: My recruiting sergeant weighed me up when I first walked into his office.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我第一次走进招募官的办公室时，他考量了我一番。

sentence.Network_en: I left a sergeant in command and rode forward to reconnoitre.
sentence.Network_cn: 我留下一名中士指挥，自己策马前去侦察敌情。

sentence.Network_en: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentence.Network_cn: 子弹嵌进了中士的腿里，使其股骨碎裂。

means.word_mean: 1. a sergeant deputized to enlist recruits

auth_sentence.content: Recruiting new members does not a band make however.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recruiting new members does not a band make however.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recruiting new members does not a band make however.

auth_sentence.content: Some is also still done by recruiting human spies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some is also still done by recruiting human spies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some is also still done by recruiting human spies.

auth_sentence.content: He was about to be promoted to platoon sergeant.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was about to be promoted to platoon sergeant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was about to be promoted to platoon sergeant.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
